lender.name: Lobos
lender.occupation: World Geography Students Helping Empower Lives
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do to make this world feel what equality really means.
lender.occupational_info: We're students trying to make someone else's life just a little bit easier.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I have been in need of loans myself before and never found a source as great as this one...and I love that I can be some small part of helping make someone's dreams come true as they build a better life for themselves and their families!
lender.occupational_info: I help people figure out the best way to build their houses and offices and stores so they are beautiful as well as safe and strong.

lender.name: Santino
lender.loan_because: I am 16 and still in high school working to become a welder. Every day i go to school an hour early to get all the time i can to develope more welding skills. Welding is a backup plan for me because i want to start my own pizza business because i have a unbeliveable 150 year old Sicilian recipe for the ideal sauce which i would love the satisfaction of seeing this product on the shelf as speghetti sauce, or made in pizza one these days with my own Pizza franchise corp. With the help of a grant this could be made possible.
lender.occupational_info: My work most of the time is researching in how to get my product on a shelf.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: Even though I am a kid I want to make a difference,and I think that everyone has an equal chance at having a good life.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: j&t
lender.loan_because: we loan to give others a chance
lender.occupational_info: i enjoy the medical field and my husband loves teaching and coaching.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to empower those who have the thoughts and action to pursue their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Business Development for natural vegan food product distribution

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I like to invest in other people's businesses and help them be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I am in website programming development.

lender.name: Mannie
lender.loan_because: I believe in small business, and enjoy seeing people become self sufficient and making a contribution.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is the RIGHT thing to do! If we all gave just a little we could stop hunger and poverty the world over.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have mental disorders and/or difficulty dealing with life's stresses and troubles. I work to guide them to loving themself for who they are and that they are worthy of any desire or goal they put their mind to.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I love to help others succeed and I want them to be successful. This is an easy way to accomplish this here and abroad. I am interested in all cultures around the world. This is another way to learn about other people and cultures.
lender.occupational_info: I have many interests including writing, paperarts, walking, cooking, auto racing fan especially Kurt Busch, Martin Truex, Jaime McMurray, JPM, Bad Brad and Matt Kenseth in Nascar-Fernando Alonso in Formula1 and Helio Castraneves, Ryan Briscoe, Will Power and Danica Patrick in Indycar. I love to write about all these things.

lender.name: LaDonna
lender.loan_because: Obama would!
lender.occupational_info: Sales

lender.name: chong chie
lender.loan_because: of the spirit of entrepreneurship
lender.occupational_info: people bring their concerns to me and i have to troubleshoot

lender.name: NLV MicCE
lender.loan_because: It's what we can do... to bring people out of conditions of financial hopelessness and poverty.
lender.occupational_info: MicCE stands for Micro Credit and Enterprise and NLV MicCE is a ministry of New Life Vineyard, Singapore. We aim to facilitate and engage in giving microcredit and investing in microenterprises.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It's a sustainable way to fight poverty, and evidence that one person can actually make a difference.

lender.name: aaron
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I fix and install equipment that connects to fiber optics for internet and data use.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to people who have troubling experiences. I work with them to find ways for them to move forward in their hearts, minds, spirits, and actions.

lender.name: Charles Flores
lender.occupational_info: I help people with mental problems and alcohol and drug problems. I also teach at a university.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I can afford to

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I love to see things grow!

lender.name: Javier
lender.loan_because: I think that it is a little for me but maybe it is a huge help for them

lender.name: Marc Forand
lender.loan_because:
Pierre Desproges once said that a banker is someone who lends you an umbrella when it is sunny and requests it back when it pours. We may all be able to do otherwise. Also, teaching fishing proves to be more sustainable.
Loosing money because of defaulted loans happens but these are small amounts, much smaller than any donation I give.
.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a team designing and building pharmaceutical facilities

lender.name: Myron Gushlak
lender.loan_because: The Myron Gushlak Foundation was created as a venue to support a diversity of causes. The Foundation strives for transparency in the increasingly opaque world of charitable contributions. The Foundation targets institutions with a high ratio of assistance to administration – those who end up dispensing the largest possible percentage of assets to the targeted need.
lender.occupational_info: My wishes are to maintain a diversity of causes. At present, the only criteria is need when that need can be effectively and efficiently supported financially.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: Everyone should get a chance!

lender.name: Molly and Nick
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps
lender.occupational_info: Molly helps to resettle refugees from other countries into New Zealand. Nick teaches music to university students.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: i want to use what little i can afford to make the world more equitable.
lender.occupational_info: i help people build better lives.

lender.name: Amy & Mike
lender.loan_because: We believe in worldwide entrepreneurship!
lender.occupational_info: Amy works as a developer creating walkable, sustainable city neighborhoods. Mike works as a project manager in commercial construction, building homes, schools and offices.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to do all that i can to actually make a difference. I believe strongly in this initiative, and will continue to loan as long as I can afford to, and as long as I find people to loan to!
lender.occupational_info: I help sales organizations improve. I work for a company that develops eLearning (online, computer-based training) for companies around the world.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I admired "Three Cups of Tea" and this is a bit closer to home for me.
lender.occupational_info: Brings back memories form the time I traveled to this part of the world and saw and met wonderful people.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want people to know there are people who care out there and want them to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Nikolaus
lender.loan_because: Those that have the drive to dream should be given the chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Master of Business Administration Student at the University of Arizona.

lender.name: Will and Anke
lender.loan_because: We have fun doing it. It is great to see your money have an immediate impact on somebody's life!
lender.occupational_info:
Will is the one making and fixing things (usually things the rest of the family have broken).
Anke works with adults who have learning disabilties - supporting with lifeskills, and making recommendations for aids and adaptations to the local government.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I was very inspired by KIVA after watching the PBS Frontline series
lender.occupational_info: Educational outreach, especially re social entrepreneurism

lender.name: Ama
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to bettering the world.

lender.name: Penelope
lender.loan_because: I believe in the microcredit model, and to empower entrepreneurs in deserving locations.
lender.occupational_info: I try to assist people whose objectives jive with mine.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I believe
lender.occupational_info: I give one on one support to special needs children

lender.name: Ronan
lender.loan_because: Change must be instituted by the common, seemingly powerless individual, in order to inspire and impact the lives of those in need. One grain of rice can tip the balance.

lender.name: CSS Students
lender.loan_because: individuals can create changes

lender.name: Vicki and Dan
lender.loan_because: We love economics and impacting people on a personal level. Having come from a 2nd-world country ourselves, we realize we are lucky as hell and want to extend opportunities to other people.
lender.occupational_info: We sit at the computer and type www.com.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that believe in hard work to survive

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it's an easy, simple way to give back and feel part of the greater world community.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop and ship software products for a major computer company.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.occupational_info: I am an English teacher.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I want to help women become more independent, self confident, and profitable in business. I received a starter gift certificate from someone very close to me for my birthday in 2008 and was told to choose well and because of his wonderful gift I am able to help women I've never met make their lives and the lives around them better. I love helping people. I've always been serious about service and this is a small way I can help and still make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: My life's work is to preserve life in all its forms, protect human rights, and work for justice and equality. I hope my two young children continue this tradition when they are older.

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I serve as HOPE International's western regional representative and am based in Denver, Colorado. I believe fully in the power of holistic, missional microfinance to change lives and transform communities.

lender.name: Soaman
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Athena
lender.loan_because: I am committed to a world where people have economic freedom and the ability to realize their own leadership vision!
lender.occupational_info: We support leaders globally to step fully into their vision, voice and personal power to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: because one person can make a difference in the lives of others!

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: it's a quick and easy way of helping people - and seeing exactly what my money is doing.
lender.occupational_info: Training to be a university librarian. Previously worked with homeless teenagers and before that ran a wholefood shop.

lender.name: Vaishali
lender.loan_because: small steps go a long way in making people self-sufficient.

lender.name: Theunis
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in other peoples lives. Just one act of kindness can change the lives of a whole family and more for better.
lender.occupational_info: I manage rental properties for owners.

lender.name: January and Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I appreciate that some people have greater needs than I do at this time in my life. We should all do what we can as a planet to help each other.

lender.name: Gil & Sally
lender.loan_because: Good people deserve a chance to better their situation. If my small contribution can help them realize their goal, I'm glad to be a positive influence in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who don't speak English communicate with their Doctors and other professionals.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. Stereotypical? Cliche? Tough, it's true.

lender.name: John

lender.occupational_info: Helping people to get connected with God.

lender.loan_because: it makes so much sense!

lender.name: Emily

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Marc Loiselle
lender.occupational_info: I build software that allows companies to build web sites.

lender.occupational_info: construction (installing ventilation) and lifeguarding in the summer and I'm a student the rest of the year. I'm a freshman

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: My brother gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birthday. I think it was the most thoughtful present ever as I really feel like I am making a difference in people's lives. I love the notion of empowering women around the world by supporting them economically.

lender.loan_because: these loans empower people in ways donations cannot
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, and am interested in studying international development and literature, especially how people use literature as a way to empower their communities during development.

lender.occupational_info: I help my company get more business through various marketing campaigns.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help children who have problems talking communicate better.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: i believe microfinance empowers individuals and communities toward shaping their futures, and brings hope to the marginalized...
lender.occupational_info: to research and advocate on behalf of women and youth in areas affected by insecurity and violence.

lender.name: Carol Astoria OR
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to think I can help.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I believe that Microfinance is a viable alternative to direct aid, which places an imbalance between donor and recipient. I believe that micro finance loans have an empowering affect on people around the world.

lender.loan_because: I believe.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: It's the least that I can do

lender.name: Marly

I want to help the world around me.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: Many people helped me when I needed it, and it's time to pay it forward.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I simply wish to do some good in the world. I am especially anxious to assist women with families living in difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a driver unloading freight ships in Anchorage, Alaska.

lender.name: Jaclyn and Kevin
lender.loan_because: Since we have met so many wonderful people during our visits to developing nations, we are very excited about having an opportunity to help entrepreneurs as part of our wedding celebration.

lender.name: derek
lender.loan_because: I can afford to do so and it just seems like a great way to specifically help someone in need rather than donating to a charity.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I feel it's a good way to help people, to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who studies linguistics. I learn about different languages, and I look at their similarities and differences. I try to figure out how humans use language, and how they know language. I also am an assistant to professors. I look at homework and help students.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I would like people to have an opportunity to stand on their own two feet and make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Edwin
lender.loan_because: empowering less fortunate people to persue their dreams is one of the most beautifull things one can do in life
lender.occupational_info: I work with a computer and make computer software for large companies.

lender.name: Wolfgang
lender.loan_because: I thinks it is a great Idea giving them opportunities to become economically independent

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: There is no good reason NOT to.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to high school students in Toyama, Japan.

lender.name: Jessica Rae
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing.

lender.name: igbineweka
lender.loan_because: i need to grow my laundry business and open both a car wash and may be a satchet drinking water company.
lender.occupational_info: it is a never ending demand in the market. everyday we use cloths and would deffinitly need to clean them but not everybody have the time to do this cleaning and that is where i come into picture to bridge the gap for those people who do not have that time to do them. i love my job and very passionate about it.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: i´ve got the chance to improve my living standards and so I want to give others this chance!

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP PEOPLE WHO ARE IN NEED OF MONEY TO CLARE THERE CREDITS.
lender.occupational_info: BY GIVEN THE COMPANY NAME AND EMAIL ADDRESS TO CONTACT,LENDER CERTIFICATE AND SOME IMPORTANT DOCUMENT

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work designing and installing computer systems for oil and gas companies in CANADA

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think microlending is a brilliant idea for the true small venture.
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers and students in a school.

lender.name: Eric Pederson
lender.loan_because: I believe loaning to the Kiva borrowers will provide the highest return on investment possible, though the extra value created will not be seen by me, but by the borrowers and the economy in which they work. It also seems like my best opportunity for making a positive impact.
lender.occupational_info: I develop business, finding areas of mutual interest with other companies and negotiating the arrangements between us. Often this involves managing a team of people and creating special processes.

lender.name: mona
lender.occupation: Dewi Sant: Do the little things
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired school teacher.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone a hand. I'm paying it forward.

lender.name: christiaan
lender.loan_because: I believe this is an important way to sustainably develop the economy in countries that need some help. By giving entrepreneurs a chance to set up their businesses they could never have started without the credits.

lender.name: a fan
lender.loan_because: I see this as yet another opportunity to help a fellow human being to live with dignity. On a lighter, selfish note, it makes me proud to be helpful :)
lender.occupational_info: I contribute to the development of mobile phones. And mobile phone can be used for communication between people who are separated by distance.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: We've enough to eat, We're healthy, We've a bed and living in a rich Country

lender.name: bazza
lender.loan_because: i know how much fun it can be running your own business once you have got started. Its hard too. but well worth it. I am going to enjoy helping you fulfil your dreams so you can spread the love too.
lender.occupational_info: I take old slate roofs off of old houses and turn them into new roofs. They last a hundred years.

lender.name: John McCain
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves, and I believe in the micro-finance model.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: What a great idea!

lender.name: guitarelements.com
lender.loan_because: I need help to carry my mission, and to help others.
lender.occupational_info:
To help others as much as I can, using my skills and my resources.
Making change for a better world and better future.

lender.loan_because: Kiva is an amazing organization that makes a difference for a lot of people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students from 13 to 18 years of age.

lender.occupational_info: I work at a big company and manage projects that assist nonprofit organizations in the United States.

lender.occupational_info: I work 2 jobs, as a Stage hand I set up concerts and stage shows. As a cartoonist, I produce a daily web strip.

lender.occupational_info: Taking care of the baby!

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: JoceL
lender.loan_because: People need an opportunity to finance their livelihood. With their success, they can provide a healthy, promising life to their children, family, and to their community. In the future, they'll be able to help others as well. It's aleviating poverty by giving people a chance in life.

lender.occupational_info:
Andrea connects entrepreneurs with their audience through compelling written messages. She writes for the web, advertising and brochures among other mediums.
Andrea is a qualified life coach practising in Sydney, Australia. Using a wholistic approach she enables everyday people to live their life in freedom and meaningful expression. Andrea specialises in health and wellbeing and cites the 'school of life' as her most rewarding teacher.
Andrea also moonlights in project management and business consultancy. She has led a Sydney-based children's charity supporting the needs of children facing learning difficulties; produced a number of high profile events and gets a real buzz out of improving the way people work and play.
